mapper.select: /*kr.go.bai.eip.aep.cam.dao.AEPCAM002QMapper.selectMainTskPrcsList*/ SELECT P.AUD_MAIN_STEP_ID, P.AUD_STEP_CD, P.AUD_MAIN_STEP_SNO, P.AUD_MAIN_SEQ_W, P.AUD_MAIN_SEQ_H, P.CMPT_YN, P.AUD_GRN_NO, TRIM(P.MAIN_JOB_NM) AS MAIN_JOB_NM, TRIM(P.LINK_TYPE) AS LINK_TYPE, P.LINK_URL, P.LINK_URL AS DOC_ID, P.AUD_MAIN_STEP_SNO FROM TBBADDED102M AS P WHERE 1=1 AND P.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND P.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND P.AUD_KND_CD = #{audKndCd} AND P.AUD_STEP_CD = 'A1099' AND P.AUD_MAIN_STEP_SNO = #{srno} ORDER BY P.AUD_MAIN_STEP_SNO, P.AUD_MAIN_SEQ_W ASC
